title: Let Your Convictions and Community Fuel Your Creativity with Adrian Walker
description: Adrian Walker shares his creative journey from documenting the marches and protests in Ferguson to moving out west to work at VSCO and to now living in Chicago as a full-time artist and photographer. Ben and Joshua discuss with Adrian his creative process, the tools he uses and making money as an artist.
dc:creator: How You Create
